short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Formats any text to give that book like look and feel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever found that website with poor formatting? So poor that it makes it impossible to focus? Don't worry, this extension solves that issue.

With 1 click you can toggle On/Off the article formatting!
